task_description: Add per-choice explanations to all quiz questions across all 12 weeks. Each answer choice needs an explanation field that displays after user selection, teaching why the choice is correct or incorrect.

phases.name: Investigation
phases.description: Analyze current quiz data structure and UI implementation
deliverables: Document current quiz JSON structure (questions, choices format)
Identify QuizInterface rendering logic for answer feedback
Determine how to add explanation field without breaking existing data
Sample explanation format for one question
success_criteria: UI rendering path identified in QuizInterface.jsx
Clear plan for adding explanation field

phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Update all 12 week JSON files with per-choice explanations
deliverables: week1.json through week12.json updated with explanation field
Each quiz choice has meaningful, educational explanation
Explanations explain WHY choice is correct/incorrect
Consistent explanation quality across all weeks
success_criteria: All 12 week files have explanations for every quiz choice
Explanations are educational and psychology-domain accurate

phases.name: UI_Implementation
phases.description: Update QuizInterface to display selected choice's explanation
deliverables: QuizInterface shows explanation when user selects any answer
UI clearly distinguishes explanation from correctness feedback
success_criteria: Clicking any answer displays that choice's explanation
No UI bugs or layout issues

phases.name: Testing
phases.description: Verify explanations display correctly with codex browser automation
deliverables: Codex test verifies explanations appear on answer selection
Test multiple weeks to ensure consistency
Screenshots confirm UI displays explanations properly
success_criteria: Test passes for at least 3 different weeks
Both correct and incorrect answer explanations work
All 12 weeks have per-choice explanations in quiz data
QuizInterface displays explanation when user clicks any answer
Codex browser test confirms feature works end-to-end
